p: INO-4800 from Inovio is a DNA plasmid vaccine. The company has experience with such platforms with candidate vaccines for MERS and SARS. The vaccine needs a delivery system through electroporation, which shall add to the cost of the vaccine. Phase I trial using two doses spaced four weeks apart has been completed and results shall be available in June 2020. Inovio is planning to start phase II-III trials soon ( 81).
